energy propulsion.name: Energy Propulsion
energy propulsion.description: Propels forward using energy from palms; Grants extra 20ft movement; Next attack has advantage

radiant resonance.name: Radiant Resonance
radiant resonance.description: Emits pulse of energy; Reveals hidden enemies; 30ft radius detection

flight.name: Flight
flight.description: Take to the air with magical energy; Hover up to 15ft; Gain advantage on ranged attacks; Immune to ground effects; 25% more damage while flying

stellar surge.name: Stellar Surge
stellar surge.description: Enhances next attack or spell; Adds radiant damage; Lasts until next attack

astral field.name: Astral Field
astral field.description: Creates shimmering energy field; Grants +2 AC

luminous barrage.name: Luminous Barrage
luminous barrage.description: Channels energy into glowing palms; Fires force projectiles automatically; Targets nearby opponents

photon jab.name: Photon Jab
photon jab.description: Swift energy-infused punch; Critical pushes target back 10ft; Grants 5 MP on hit

pulse flurry.name: Pulse Flurry
pulse flurry.description: Unleashes flurry of electrified punches; Each hit has chance to stun; Disrupts opponent actions

radiant burst.name: Radiant Burst
radiant burst.description: Releases short-range burst of energy; 10ft radius; DEX save DC 15: half damage on success, full damage and disadvantage on fail

stellar uppercut.name: Stellar Uppercut
stellar uppercut.description: Energy-infused uppercut; Launches target into air; Improved when used in combo

comet dive.name: Comet Dive
comet dive.description: Powerful downward strike; Only usable against airborne targets; Slams target to ground leaving them prone

ethereal needles.name: Ethereal Needles
ethereal needles.description: Materializes shimmering energy needles; Lasts for 3 turns; Enables special needle attacks

needle thrust.name: Needle Thrust
needle thrust.description: Quick, precise needle jab; Deals half damage; Gains advantage on attack

arcane sweep.name: Arcane Sweep
arcane sweep.description: Sweeping attack with needles; Targets multiple enemies; 15ft arc

spectral toss.name: Spectral Toss
spectral toss.description: Throws needle with pinpoint accuracy; 25ft range; 50% critical chance

celestial bombardment.name: Celestial Bombardment
celestial bombardment.description: Charges massive energy sphere; Throws at designated area; DEX save DC 15: half damage on success, full damage and disorientation on fail

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Creates massive explosion of stellar energy; 20ft radius; Area remains charged with energy; DEX save DC 15: half damage on success, full damage on fail

aurora wall.name: Aurora Wall
aurora wall.description: Conjures radiant wall to repel attacks; CON save vs attack roll: complete negation on success, half damage on failure

starlight maneuver.name: Starlight Maneuver
starlight maneuver.description: Enhances agility to evade attack; Releases stun bombs toward attacker; +4 AC until next turn; DEX save DC 15 for attacker: stunned on fail, disadvantage on next attack on success

heat protection.name: Heat Protection
heat protection.description: Conjures protective energy barrier; Absorbs incoming attacks; INT save DC 12: gains temp HP on success, fails to conjure barrier on fail; Grants 3d4+INT temporary HP
